# InsertXmlData.LoadXmlFromFile method

Retrieves `Xml` content of specified *table* in a file.

```csharp
protected static IEnumerable<XElement> LoadXmlFromFile(string fileName, string table)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| fileName | Target filename |
| table | Table to retrieve |

## Return Value

A collection of XElement that contains the table content as XML.
